Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum steered the Celtics to a 22-point cushion after the first half with 26 points and five three-pointers.
The Celtics bombarded Atlanta with 18 drained three-pointers and outrebounded them 50-43.
Boston tallied 35 fast break points compared to Atlanta’s four.
Boston intercepted the leather 15 times and recorded seven blocks.
Jayson Tatum had a near triple-double performance with nine assists, six rebounds, and two steals.
Derrick White scored 21 points, six rebounds, six assists, two steals, and a block.
Payton Pritchard scored 18 points off the bench with three treys and four field goals from the perimeter.
